cmput301w14t13.project.services
Class LocationSelection

java.lang.Object
  cmput301w14t13.project.services.LocationSelection

public class LocationSelection
extends java.lang.Object

Responsible for doing all the set up or listening and updating the users current GPS location Used whenever the users current location is needed.For Example, whenever we Create a Topic or Comment or whenever we sort by location.

Author:
nsd

Method Detail

registerContext

public void registerContext(Context context)

getInstance

public static LocationSelection getInstance()

startLocationSelection

public void startLocationSelection()
This function initiates a location manager and a listener for our GPS location in order to be able to pull current GPS location of phone. This function will constantly update GPS or network location based on either one's availability. This function is called by other methods that need to retrieve current location.

stopLocationSelection

public void stopLocationSelection()
This function stops location manager and listener. This function is called after a location is retrieved and returned, and GPS location pulls are no longer required.

setProvider

public void setProvider(java.lang.String provider)
ForTesting purposes Allows our unit Tests to create a mock location provider so that this class can acquire location when unit tested on emulator where GPS and Network providers are absent

Parameters:
provier -
